snippet.title: Chelsea rallies to join Real Madrid in Champions League semifinals
snippet.description:
* It was one of the most memorable scenes in recent Champions League history -- Jose Mourinho running along the touchline to celebrate with his Porto side at Old Trafford after a late goal knocked out Manchester United in 2004.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/08/sport/football/champions-league-chelsea-real-madrid/index.html

snippet.title: Lionel Messi rescues Barcelona's Spanish title hopes
snippet.description:
* It was far from vintage Barcelona, but it was enough to keep alive the Catalan club's dwindling hopes of retaining the Spanish league title.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/20/sport/football/messi-barcelona-spain-football/index.html

snippet.title: Juventus cruises, Valencia rallies to reach Europa League semifinals
snippet.description:
* There was a time when Italian teams dominated European football's second-tier competition, winning the UEFA Cup in six of seven seasons starting in the late 1980s. But the last Italian outfit to win the event, now the Europa League, was Parma in 1999.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/10/sport/football/europa-league-football-juventus/index.html

snippet.title: Los momentos que 'encendieron' los premios MTV
snippet.description:
* Por Jane Caffrey (CNN) — Los MTV Movie Awards 2014 en Los Ángeles, Estados Unidos, este domingo, estuvieron llenos de risas, moda destacada y presentaciones musicales. El conductor Conan O'Brien comenzó el programa con un récord de 50 cameos de...
http://cnnespanol.cnn.com/2014/04/14/los-momentos-que-encendieron-los-premios-mtv/

snippet.title: Bayern Munich to face Real Madrid, Atletico to meet Chelsea
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Bonucci gives Juventus edge against Lyon in Europa quarters
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Money bags Monaco splash out $90 million on Porto pair
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Ozil rescues Real Madrid in Bernabeu; Malaga and Porto seal passage
snippet.description:
